_comment_check_interval: How often to check for signals (minutes) - default 15
_comment_dry_run: Set to false to enable live trading (currently simulated only)
_comment_notifications: Enable email/SMS notifications for position changes
_comment_ib_port: IB Port: 7497 for Paper Trading, 7496 for Live Trading
_comment_position_size: Use 95% of capital for positions, keep 5% as cash buffer
_comment_trading_hours: Only trade during market hours (9:30 AM - 4:00 PM ET)
_notification_comment: Configure notification settings (email, SMS, Telegram, etc.)
